actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Humphrey. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 259.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: An original bill to authorize a partial transfer of the authority of the Maine-New Hampshire Interstate Bridge Authority to the States of Maine and New Hampshire.

summary.text: Authorizes the States of Maine and New Hampshire to assume all construction, maintenance and operational authority over approach roads and grade separation structures in their respective areas. Directs such States to require the Maine-New Hampshire Interstate Bridge Authority to provide funds for capital improvements.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize a partial transfer of the authority of the Maine-New Hampshire Interstate Bridge Authority to the States of Maine and New Hampshire.
